document.full_text: adrian gonzalez smacked a two-run double off the left-field wall with one out in the ninth inning to give the boston red sox an 8-7 win over the visiting baltimore orioles on monday night.
document.title: roundup: red sox rally to beat orioles and top .500
lines_and_colors: adrian gonzalez smacked a two-run double off the left-field wall with one out in the ninth inning to give the boston red sox an 8-7 win over the visiting baltimore orioles on monday night.
